description: Non-English PMIDs used for testing international language support in metapub

German.description: German medical journals and historical articles

French.description: French medical journals and historical articles

Spanish.description: Spanish medical journals including Medicina (B Aires)

Italian.description: Italian medical journals and historical articles

Japanese.description: Japanese medical journals including Brain Nerve, No Shinkei Geka

Chinese.description: Chinese medical journals including Zhonghua series

Russian.description: Russian medical journals including Zh Nevrol Psikhiatr

usage_notes: These PMIDs are used in test_pubmed_article.py to ensure international language support
PMIDs cover both recent articles (2019-2024) and historical articles (1970s-1980s)
Tests validate pubdate property, citation formatting, and character encoding
Includes articles from major medical journals in each language
